body_html: @erikbrinkman Full matrix format is useful if we want to apply some custom mask or weights for pairs of points (in deep metric learning scenarios). And in every case, utilities for conversion between full and condensed formats would be very useful.
body_text: @erikbrinkman Full matrix format is useful if we want to apply some custom mask or weights for pairs of points (in deep metric learning scenarios). And in every case, utilities for conversion between full and condensed formats would be very useful.
